name: Seal Empire
declaringWar: You seem to treat our children badly, prepare to be treated the same.
attacked: What, a war?? it is a foreign concept to us.
defeated: There is no way the land creatures are able to destroy us, the goddess of the sea promised that creatures of the sea will conquer the land.
introduction: Greetings, i am the chosen of the sea goddess.
neutralHello: How are you doing, my land friend?
afterPeace: Very well, all that fighting was tiring for us.
tradeRequest: We would like to trade our resources with yours.
